mapper.sql: id, name, sort, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select: select a.name,a.id,IFNULL(b.num,0) num,a.icon from blog_tag a left join ( SELECT tag_id, count( tag_id ) num FROM ( SELECT substring_index( substring_index( qa.tag_id, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',',- 1 ) AS tag_id FROM blog_article qa JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( length( qa.tag_id ) - length( REPLACE ( qa.tag_id, ',', '' ) ) + 1 ) ) a GROUP BY a.tag_id ) b on a.id = b.tag_id
